text: int main ( ) { int n , r , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , t [ 100 ] , temp , i , j , t1 , t2 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { t [ i ] = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } t [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { temp = t [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { t1 = t [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; t2 = temp + a [ i ] [ j ] ; temp = t [ j ] ; t [ j ] = t1 > t2 ? t1 : t2 ; } t [ 0 ] += a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; } temp = t [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < r ; i ++ ) if ( temp < t [ i ] ) temp = t [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , temp ) ; } return 0 ; }
